items.sentence: Both Tom and Mary aren\'t very good at speaking French.
Tom couldn\'t just sit by and watch Mary being bullied.
Tom couldn\'t sneak out of the dorm without being seen.
Tom couldn\'t speak any French, so we spoke in English.
Tom couldn\'t stand Mary not knowing what had happened.
You aren\'t permitted to bring dogs into this building.
You can\'t let Tom eat anything that has peanuts in it.
It\'s too bad Tom doesn\'t understand French very well.
Tom doesn\'t have any idea where Mary wants to do that.
I went to the store to buy some shampoo and toothpaste.
I wonder why Tom thought it was a good idea to do that.
I assume that Tom will eat dinner with us this evening.
It would be crazy to climb that mountain in the winter.
It would be good for Tom to get a little more exercise.
This is the best Christmas present I\'ve ever received.
This kind of hot weather is something I\'m not used to.
I have fond memories of all the time we spent together.
Tom was so angry at Mary he couldn\'t even look at her.
Tom told me that I should drop by sometime for a visit.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary would be curious.
